full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA'I RNAM BSHAD PHUL BYUNG BZHAD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @047B CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA'I RNAM BSHAD PHUL BYUNG BZHAD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN SANGS RGYAS BKRA SHIS PAS NAN TAN DU BGYIS TE BSKUL BA'I NGOR MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL @048A *, ,MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS NYID KYI RANG 'GREL DANG, NAG TSO'I 'GREL PA DANG, STON PA RIN PO CHE DANG, PU TO BA'I GSUNG BGROS GZHAN MANG PO DANG, KHYAD PAR DGE BSHES DOL PA'I BE'U BUM SNGON PO DANG, SHA RA BA'I LAM RIM DANG, SNAR THANG PA'I LAM MCHOG DANG, GZHAN YANG BKA' GDAMS KYI BSTAN RIM MANG PO ZHIG LA'ANG BSTEN CING, KHYAD PAR SNYIGS DUS KYI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I LEGS PAR BSHAD PA LA GZHI BGYIS TE, BDAG CAG GI STON PA MNGON PAR BYANG CHUB PA'I ZLA TSES KHYAD PAR CAN LA, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIM KHANG DU GRUB PAR GA-YAR KHRAL DU STZAL BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,SVASTI, RAB 'BYAMS GSUNG RAB KUN GYI GNAD BSDUS PA, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA'I 'GREL PA 'DI, ,DPON YIG MKHAS PA CHOS SKYONG BSAM GRUB DANG, SPAR MKHAS RDO RJE RGYAL PO ZHES BYAS BSGRUBS, ,'DIS MTSON DGE BAS 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,GNAS SKABS TSE RING NAD MED BDE SKYID LDAN, ,BDE 'GRO'I RTEN BRGYUD RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI, ,GO 'PHANG DAM PA MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG , ,,SHU BHAM STU SARBA DZA GA ?
